data.name: li1
data.value: Learn what is the current level of your enterprise’s innovation process digitalisation

data.name: li2
data.value: Get access to the information on how your position can be improved

data.name: li3
data.value: Find out what is your position in relation to other enterprises according to criteria of your choice

data.name: li4
data.value: Track progress of your enterprise’s innovation process digitalisation and how your relative competitive position is changing

data.name: Pic Text
data.value: Learn and benchmark your Innovation Process Digitalisation Index!

data.name: Text1
data.value:
Making the right decisions is critical for all firms’ survival. And it is never easy! But more relevant decisions always come with better information! If you are considering if and when to invest in innovation process digitalisation, here you will find interesting insights. The benchmark will help you understand your position in comparison to other companies operating in similar context.

The Digital Innovation Benchmarking Tool is an innovative, online interactive platform for SMEs to identify their current levels of innovation process digitalisation. This simple, yet powerful tool was designed to help businesses to create a benchmark of where their innovation development process is in terms of utilizing digital tools which are available, as compared to others.

The Tool analyses the use of digital tools in the enterprise that support innovation management. These include for instance digital solutions that can be used for ideating, collecting and selecting of ideas, building and testing prototypes, collaborating on ideas development, or managing innovation portfolio.

The analysis is mapped across innovation process logic, that was described in detail within the Digital Innovation project, an international initiative started by European scientists and practitioners in 2020, funded by the European Commission from the Erasmus+ program. Go to Digital Innovation website to see a detailed Digital Innovation Process Audit. To inspire yourself on how and which digital tools can be used to facilitate your innovation process go to our Digital Innovation Scanner!

data.name: Text1Register
data.value: Register to the platform and get all the benefits!

data.name: Text2
data.value:
How does it work?

The Benchmarking Tool is based on a simple survey-based mechanism, that is aligned with a powerful platform to generate real-time reports automatically comparing the participant with all previous users without revealing any company-specific data. In addition, as survey results are saved in personalised account, it is also possible to track the digital revolution of innovation process management in a company over time. A single survey can be used for multiple analysis as it is stored always on a private account. The user decides the types of reports to be generated!

data.name: Text3
data.value: The Benchmarking Tool is only available to registered participants and thus the comparative reports remain confidential and are accessible only in your individual profile.

data.name: Text4
data.value:
The platform is a scientific project and is based on the highest standards of ethics and confidentiality. Users will not be billed at any stage. Should you have any additional questions, please do not hesitate to contact our team directly.

Go to General results section to learn current value of Innovation Process Digitalisation Index and how the innovation process digitalisation is changing.

The number and engagement of our users is growing!

data.value: Benchmarking Tool by Innovating Digitally Consortium is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NoDerivatives 4.0 International License.
